org.openpnp.machine.reference.driver

Class TcpCommunications

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openpnp.machine.reference.driver.ReferenceDriverCommunications
      • org.openpnp.machine.reference.driver.TcpCommunications

  • public class TcpCommunications
extends ReferenceDriverCommunications
    A base class for basic TCP based Drivers. Includes functions for connecting, disconnecting, reading and sending lines.

        public java.lang.String readLine()
                          throws java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException,
                                 java.io.IOException
        Read a line from the socket. Blocks for the default timeout. If the read times out a TimeoutException is thrown. Any other failure to read results in an IOExeption;
